### 22-58132 Unmanned Air Systems and Flight Services
#### Advance Contract Award Notice

**Notice Type:** Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
**Reference Number:** PW-23-01029902

#### Solicitation Background

The National Research Council (NRC) of Canada's Flight Research Laboratory (FRL) invites interested suppliers to submit a statement of capabilities in response to the solicitation for Unmanned Air Systems and Flight Services (22-58132).

The FRL requires the overhaul of its Peregrine Autonomy System to enable operations in more demanding flight environments. The system must be returned to the Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM), Near Earth Autonomy (NEA), for overhaul, including the addition of moisture and dust ingress protection/mitigation.

#### Project Overview

The NRC-FRL is engaged in a client-offset research project entitled the Canadian Vertical Lift Autonomy Demonstration (CVLAD) program. This project aims to develop, implement, and evaluate autonomous flight systems technologies onboard a full-scale aircraft.

The solicitation is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Minimum Essential Requirements

To be considered, suppliers must demonstrate by way of a statement of capabilities that their product/equipment/system meets the following minimum essential requirements:

* System (integrated hardware/software) solution delivery and support of integration flight tests
* Knowledge of the Peregrine architecture and design to implement moisture and dust ingress modifications and firmware modifications
* Overhauled payload compliance with the external integration form factor of 1.5-by-1-by-1 (L x W x H) foot and an internal aircraft integration limited to operator and pilot display technology

#### Statement of Capabilities

Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the goods, services, or construction services described in this notice may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the contact person identified in this notice on or before the closing date of March 27, 2023 at 2:00 p.m. EDT.
